SELECT dp.drugPrescriptionID, dp.appointmentID, dp.drugTypeID, dp.drugID, dp.drugTimeID, dp.drugDoseUnit, dp.drugAdviceID, dp.drugWhenID, dt.initial AS typeInitial, d.drugName AS drugName, d.strength AS drugStrength, dwt.textEng AS drugWhenStr, dat.textEng AS drugAdviceStr FROM drug_prescription dp JOIN drug_type dt ON dp.drugTypeID = dt.drugTypeID JOIN drug d ON dp.drugID = d.drugID LEFT JOIN drug_when_type dwt ON dp.drugWhenID = dwt.drugWhentypeID LEFT JOIN drug_advice_type dat ON dp.drugAdviceID = dat.drugAdviceID
WHERE dp.`appointmentID`= #{appointmentID}

SELECT dp.drugDoseID, dp.drugPrescriptionID, dp.dose, dp.numOffDay, dp.durationType, dwt.textEng AS drugWhenStr FROM drug_dose_period dp LEFT JOIN drug_when_type dwt ON dp.durationType = dwt.drugWhentypeID WHERE drugPrescriptionID = #{drugPrescriptionID}
